passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > ul:nth-child(1) > li:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > main:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(16) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > div > ul:nth-child(1) > li > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(21) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(2)
